channel.title: CVE Feed for The Gnome Project -- gnome-shell
channel.description: The latest CVEs for The Gnome Project -- gnome-shell

item.title: CVE-2019-3820|2024-08-04T19:19:18.588Z -- the%20gnome%20project -- gnome-shell
item.description: It was discovered that the gnome-shell lock screen since version 3.15.91 did not properly restrict all contextual actions. An attacker with physical access to a locked workstation could invoke certain keyboard shortcuts, and potentially other actions.
